DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective clinical trial determine Dynamic Socket Sub-Ischial alternative interface design improve socket comfort , residual limb health , increase function preferred standard care Ischial Ramus Containment ( IRC ) interface military veteran live transfemoral limb loss .
